messages.subject: Re: Food sensitivites/dyes..
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/3/02 1:48:58 PM Pacific Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/3/02 1:48:58 PM Pacific Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< So, how long do you think it will be before the medical community at
large recognizes behavioural symptoms of food sensitivities???? >>

My father has been trying for YEARS to try to get the medical
community at large to recognize these symptoms as allergies.
BTW, he's an M.D. who specializes in nutrition, allergies, and
preventative medicine.

His website: http://www.tahomaclinic.com

Andrea Kim :-)
Mommy to two sweeties!
Laura (almost 6!) and Allison (2)
Kent, WA,,,,,soon to be Seattle!
